heroSubtitle: Your Private Paradise in Patong, Phuket
heroDescription: Discover the ultimate escape at Moon Beach Villa, a modern 3-story private sanctuary just moments from the white sands and crystal-clear waters of Patong Beach. Embrace the freedom of beachfront living with panoramic sea views that soothe the soul, morning to night.

connectivity.title: Seamless Connectivity for Work & Leisure
connectivity.description: Stay connected with lightning-fast, secure Wi-Fi available throughout the villa—perfect for digital nomads or those who just want to stream and surf without interruption.

airport.title: Airport Transfers Made Easy
airport.description: Start your vacation stress-free with our convenient airport pick-up and drop-off service—designed to make your journey as smooth as your stay.

amenities.title: Thoughtfully Curated Amenities
amenities.description: Let us take care of the little things. Enjoy daily housekeeping, complimentary snacks, and refreshing soft drinks that make you feel right at home from the moment you arrive.

hospitality.title: Warm, Personalized Hospitality
hospitality.description: Our dedicated team is here to make your stay effortless and memorable. Whether it’s arranging local tours, offering insider tips, or fulfilling special requests, we’re here every step of the way.

relaxSubtitle: Unwind in a spacious, 3-level villa crowned with a rooftop haven. Every corner has been  meticulously crafted to elevate your stay—whether you're gathering with friends, enjoying family time, or savoring a romantic retreat.
relaxDescription: From panoramic sea views and open living spaces to a fully equipped kitchen, BBQ corner, outdoor dining area, and a private infinity edge pool with coral beach vibe—every detail invites you to slow down, breathe in, and truly feel at home.

villaFeatures.title: 3-Bedroom Pool Villa
villaFeatures.extras: Private Rooftop, Infinity Pool, Grill & Chill Zone, Exclusive Parking Space

moon.title: Moon —
moon.description: A symbol of serenity, mystery, and romance. It reflects those quiet, magical nights where relaxation and inspiration flow beneath a glowing sky.

beach.title: Beach —
beach.description: Where freedom, joy, and natural harmony unite. The soothing sound of waves and the soft sands welcome you to let go and simply be.

villa.title: Villa —
villa.description: Not just a place to stay, but a private retreat that reflects your unique style. Designed for comfort, elegance, and intimacy—it’s your personal hideaway.

penthouse.tagline: Moon Beach Villa – Place where the Moonlight meets the Sea
penthouse.description: At Moon Beach Villa, every detail is inspired by nature’s calm and beauty—crafted to awaken your senses and restore your spirit.
penthouse.homeVibe: The vibe is home-meets-hideaway. A dreamlike escape that feels just like home, tucked away in nature’s embrace.

partnersSectionDescription: In partnership with top travel platforms like Airbnb, Agoda or booking via social media in any platforms. We make booking easy and your experience seamless from start to finish.

primeLocation.p1: Perfectly placed just minutes from Patong Beach, Moon Beach Villa gives you instant access to peaceful shores and vibrant nightlife alike.
primeLocation.p2: Explore iconic landmarks like the Big Buddha, Phuket Old Town, and Bangla Road—all just a short drive away. Whether you seek peace, adventure, or cultural discovery, everything is within reach.

bangla.title: Bangla Road
bangla.description: Experience Phuket’s famous nightlife on Bangla Road—home to vibrant bars, live music, and nonstop energy just steps from Patong Beach.

dining.title: Dining
dining.description: From fresh seafood to upscale dining, Patong offers a rich culinary scene. Savor beachfront restaurants or explore local street food gems.

shopping.title: Shopping
shopping.description: Discover local markets, boutique shops, and modern malls in Patong. Perfect for souvenirs, fashion, and artisanal finds.

sightseeing.title: Sightseeing
sightseeing.description: Explore landmarks like the Big Buddha, Wat Chalong, and Phuket Old Town—all within a short drive from Moon Beach Villa.
